@dlrcc What’s the plan for adapting parking regs on residential roads to cater for modern realities of Dublin commuting & multiple house renovations on roads designed 70-100 years ago? The current free-for-all, no limits scenario is high risk to pedestrians & emergency services

@dlrcc @barrymward @CormacDevlin An example of why we need to have enforcement of proper parking systems in our borough. It’s a free-for-all. Footpaths are for pedestrians & small children, not for parking. https://t.co/ywW2DzLTqt
